content:
Hi...,

Can I embed js code into a page ?

i.e. In the Body of a page

<div class="mistvideo" id="party_Y989oOjereEs">
<noscript>
<a href="http://ipaddress:8080/party.html" target="_blank">
Click here to play this video
</a>
</noscript>
<script>
var a = function(){
mistPlay("party",{
target: document.getElementById("party_Y989oOjereEs"),
fillSpace: true
});
};
if (!window.mistplayers) {
var p = document.createElement("script");
p.src = "http://[IP address]/player.js"
document.head.appendChild(p);
p.onload = a;
}
else { a(); }
</script>
</div>
Depends on what input format you're using and if it strips out certain tags or not...

BWPanda said:

Depends on what input format you're using and if it strips out certain tags or not...
